definition: Li Yu (1611-c. 1680), late Ming and early Qing writer and dramatist
plum
surname Li
fisherman/to fish

sentences.english: Li Yu and Aina Jushi is the best writer In the short vernacular fiction novel writing In the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李渔和艾衲居士是清代最出色的短篇白话小说作家。

sentences.english: The purpose of Li Yu's writing was to raise a laugh and to eliminate worries.
sentences.chinese: 李渔的戏曲创作宗旨就是博人一笑，替人消愁。
